title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When using the new class wizard in the code editor, the context for nested classes is not set correctly.
OB: When creating a nested class using the new class wizard in the code editor, the context is not set correctly.
EB: When creating a nested class using the new class wizard in the code editor, the context should be set correctly.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the code editor. 
2. Choose the option to create a new class. 
3. Select the option to create a nested class within an existing class. 
4. Complete the wizard and observe that the context for the nested class is not set correctly.
